name: Axe Oil
description: Axe Brand Universal Oil made from a unique formula and has been used throughout the world for over 80 years. It is pure in color and pleasant in odour. It is mild yet suitable for relief of giddiness, headaches, blocked nose and colds, stomach-aches, insect bites, rheumatic pains and muscular pains. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
